crimeaditionalinfo:
It was during the Covid of October  as I was working from home that my PC was observed to be slow and had significant under performance I had contacted our Office IT support and was undergoing the process of formatting my PC

During the PC formatting as I was installing our subscribed antivirus I noticed all the PC drives were BitLocked and all the files of the external hard drive  whether it is a media document had a strange extension mmpa I informed our IT team who said that probably it is a ransomware attack The PC was formatted again and was brought back to service

However unfortunately I had lost considerable personal files of my external hard drive that was connected to the PC during the installation where I had stored all my family media and other important documents I am unable to open any file in the external hard drive as it shows it is encrypted Even today I had kept those files in the hard drive with a ray of hope that someday I may be able to open my personal files that I had backed up over the years

Hence I humbly request the government to please help me in this regard

crimeaditionalinfo:
My name is Sarath Chandran I am residing in maruthoor trivandrum On February st I enquired for a loan in an app named KOKO LOAN All I did was an inquiry on how much I will get Unfortunately I have given my account details to that application Without my consent  they have deposited Rs  on  feb  and a repayment amount of Rs  is shown in the application There was no call from them till Saturday On Sunday morning I received a message from this Loan app via Whatsapp to pay the amount within the day to avoid any threat from them If I do not pay the amount on that day they said they will take access to my contact list and send everyone a message saying that I am a loan fraud I have chatted with them and said that I am willing to give back the Rs  which was deposited without my consent But they refused this and told me that I have to pay the whole Rs  I reported the chat and blocked them by taking a screenshot of the chat Several hours later I received another message saying If I do not pay the amount by   pm they will create a group with my picture and post the pics of my Pan card and Adhaar card saying I am a loan fraud and other bad words When I inquired about this fraud app I saw a lot of complaints registered from different places They have been pulling this scam for a long time
After that I received almost the same messages on Monday and Tuesday saying the exact same things There is another app named Rupeemall
